quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
name: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
name: John Muir

quote: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.
name: Gerard De Nerval

quote: In nature, light creates the color. In the picture, color creates the light.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
name: George Santayana

quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Nature's beauty is a gift that cultivates appreciation and gratitude.
name: Louie Schwartzberg

quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The woods are lovely, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep, and miles to go before I sleep.
name: Robert Frost

quote: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
name: Albert Camus

quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Colors are the smiles of nature.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: Curiosity is the one thing invincible in Nature.
name: Freya Stark

quote: It is not only fine feathers that make fine birds.
name: Aesop

quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.
name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.
name: Pamela Hansford Johnson

quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
name: Theodore Roethke

quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
name: Albert Camus

quote: I can find God in nature, in animals, in birds and the environment.
name: Pat Buckley

quote: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Sunset is still my favorite color, and rainbow is second.
name: Mattie Stepanek

quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
name: John Muir

quote: Even in winter an isolated patch of snow has a special quality.
name: Andy Goldsworthy

quote: Mountains are earth's undecaying monuments.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
name: Voltaire

quote: I believe a leaf of grass is no less than the journey-work of the stars.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: The mountains are calling and I must go.
name: John Muir

quote: Some people walk in the rain, others just get wet.
name: Roger Miller

quote: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life.
name: John Updike

quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: One must ask children and birds how cherries and strawberries taste.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: If you can't be in awe of Mother Nature, there's something wrong with you.
name: Alex Trebek

quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
name: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: O, wind, if winter comes, can spring be far behind?
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: That the sea is one of the most beautiful and magnificent sights in Nature, all admit.
name: John Joly

quote: A light wind swept over the corn, and all nature laughed in the sunshine.
name: Anne Bronte

quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Autumn arrives in early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: A bee is never as busy as it seems; it's just that it can't buzz any slower.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I'm so not stylish by nature, but I've learned to work with what I have.
name: Julie Bowen

quote: The lake and the mountains have become my landscape, my real world.
name: Georges Simenon

quote: Winter is not a season, it's an occupation.
name: Sinclair Lewis

quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world the master calls a butterfly.
name: Richard Bach

quote: My wish is to stay always like this, living quietly in a corner of nature.
name: Claude Monet

quote: Winter is nature's way of saying, 'Up yours.'
name: Robert Byrne

quote: My soul can find no staircase to Heaven unless it be through Earth's loveliness.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: A forest bird never wants a cage.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
name: John Donne

quote: The Amen of nature is always a flower.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: The temple bell stops but I still hear the sound coming out of the flowers.
name: Matsuo Basho

quote: And finally Winter, with its bitin', whinin' wind, and all the land will be mantled with snow.
name: Roy Bean

quote: Gray skies are just clouds passing over.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: This sunlight linked me through the ages to that past consciousness.
name: Richard Jefferies

quote: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
name: William James

quote: Pick a flower on Earth and you move the farthest star.
name: Paul Dirac

quote: Space exploration is a force of nature unto itself that no other force in society can rival.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.
name: Hal Borland

quote: Behind every cloud is another cloud.
name: Judy Garland

quote: The earth laughs in flowers.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Clouds symbolize the veils that shroud God.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Scenery is fine - but human nature is finer.
name: John Keats

quote: Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: Human nature is not black and white but black and grey.
name: Graham Greene

quote: Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Deep in their roots, all flowers keep the light.
name: Theodore Roethke

quote: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a function.
name: Garrison Keillor

quote: Sex is a part of nature. I go along with nature.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A lot of people like snow. I find it to be an unnecessary freezing of water.
name: Carl Reiner

quote: Nature does nothing in vain.
name: Aristotle

quote: Man is by nature a political animal.
name: Aristotle

quote: External nature is only internal nature writ large.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: The good man is the friend of all living things.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God.
name: Euclid

quote: If you wish to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Light in Nature creates the movement of colors.
name: Robert Delaunay

quote: There are moments when all anxiety and stated toil are becalmed in the infinite leisure and repose of nature.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Flowers are the sweetest things God ever made and forgot to put a soul into.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The ocean is a mighty harmonist.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon verdure is the most perfect refreshment.
name: Jane Austen

quote: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: For the mind disturbed, the still beauty of dawn is nature's finest balm.
name: Edwin Way Teale

quote: Twilight drops her curtain down, and pins it with a star.
name: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quote: Nature is full of genius, full of the divinity; so that not a snowflake escapes its fashioning hand.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The tree that is beside the running water is fresher and gives more fruit.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: The moon looks upon many night flowers; the night flowers see but one moon.
name: Jean Ingelow

quote: There are no lines in nature, only areas of colour, one against another.
name: Edouard Manet

quote: Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
name: Socrates

quote: What is government itself but the greatest of all reflections on human nature?
name: James Madison

quote: Even if one tree falls down it wouldn't affect the entire forest.
name: Chen Shui-bian

quote: Eventually, my eyes were opened, and I really understood nature. I learned to love at the same time.
name: Claude Monet

quote: The fairest thing in nature, a flower, still has its roots in earth and manure.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Human nature is evil, and goodness is caused by intentional activity.
name: Xun Kuang

quote: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
name: Louis Nizer

quote: Birds sing after a storm; why shouldn't people feel as free to delight in whatever sunlight remains to them?
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: By nature, I keep moving, man. My theory is, be the shark. You've just got to keep moving. You can't stop.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: Nature never did betray the heart that loved her.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Everything in excess is opposed to nature.
name: Hippocrates

quote: In the Spring, I have counted 136 different kinds of weather inside of 24 hours.
name: Mark Twain

quote: All nature is but art unknown to thee.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: The flower is the poetry of reproduction. It is an example of the eternal seductiveness of life.
name: Jean Giraudoux

quote: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.
name: Aristotle

quote: What's a butterfly garden without butterflies?
name: Roy Rogers

quote: When you have seen one ant, one bird, one tree, you have not seen them all.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: Blue, green, grey, white, or black; smooth, ruffled, or mountainous; that ocean is not silent.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Moonlight is sculpture.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: No man has received from nature the right to command his fellow human beings.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: I have always believed that your face is a mirror to your nature.
name: Sridevi

quote: Bald as the bare mountain tops are bald, with a baldness full of grandeur.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: Autumn's the mellow time.
name: William Allingham

quote: We still do not know one thousandth of one percent of what nature has revealed to us.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I saw old Autumn in the misty morn stand shadowless like silence, listening to silence.
name: Thomas Hood

quote: The bluebird carries the sky on his back.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I'm very gregarious, but I love being in the hills on my own.
name: Norman MacCaig

quote: Don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Human nature is potentially aggressive and destructive and potentially orderly and constructive.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom.
name: Elizabeth Appell

quote: Human society sustains itself by transforming nature into garbage.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with Nature.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it.
name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: I go to nature to be soothed and healed, and to have my senses put in order.
name: John Burroughs

quote: Nothing happens to any man that he is not formed by nature to bear.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: We all have these shades in our nature: it's a spectrum within all of us.
name: Johnny Flynn

quote: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
name: Moliere

quote: Creativity is the ability to introduce order into the randomness of nature.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: Nature chooses who will be transgender; individuals don't choose this.
name: Mercedes Ruehl

quote: In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Blue thou art, intensely blue; Flower, whence came thy dazzling hue?
name: James Montgomery

quote: How inappropriate to call this planet Earth when it is quite clearly Ocean.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: We have the capacity to receive messages from the stars and the songs of the night winds.
name: Ruth St. Denis

quote: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is Nature's delight.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The view of Earth is spectacular.
name: Sally Ride

quote: People need to be cautious because anything built by man can be destroyed by Mother Nature.
name: Russel Honore

quote: Art in Nature is rhythmic and has a horror of constraint.
name: Robert Delaunay

quote: The peacock has become one of my regular sources of inspiration from nature.
name: Matthew Williamson

quote: Sunlight is painting.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Nothing is art if it does not come from nature.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: Nature was here a series of wonders, and a fund of delight.
name: Daniel Boone

quote: I want to do with you what spring does with cherry trees.
name: Pablo Neruda

quote: The world is mud-luscious and puddle-wonderful.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: A morning-glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: The skull is nature's sculpture.
name: David Bailey

quote: The sky lovingly smiles on the earth and her children.
name: Henry Morton Stanley

quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
name: L. Wolfe Gilbert

quote: For me nature is not landscape, but the dynamism of visual forces.
name: Bridget Riley

quote: Painting from nature is not copying the object; it is realizing one's sensations.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: Whatever the universal nature assigns to any man at any time is for the good of that man at that time.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The violets in the mountains have broken the rocks.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: Nature uses as little as possible of anything.
name: Johannes Kepler

quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
name: Al Gore

quote: Go forth under the open sky, and list To Nature's teachings.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: I know the lands are lit, with all the autumn blaze of Goldenrod.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art.
name: Philip James Bailey

quote: The sea has neither meaning nor pity.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: I don't like formal gardens. I like wild nature. It's just the wilderness instinct in me, I guess.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Spring is nature's way of saying, 'Let's party!'
name: Robin Williams

quote: I had to live in the desert before I could understand the full value of grass in a green ditch.
name: Ella Maillart

quote: Should you shield the canyons from the windstorms you would never see the true beauty of their carvings.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: All my life through, the new sights of Nature made me rejoice like a child.
name: Marie Curie

quote: If you can't sit in a cafe quietly and be ignored, how can you observe human nature and write a story?
name: Evangeline Lilly

quote: No tendency is quite so strong in human nature as the desire to lay down rules of conduct for other people.
name: William Howard Taft

quote: The nature of God is a circle of which the center is everywhere and the circumference is nowhere.
name: Empedocles

quote: Mother Nature made me the way I am, and I should be happy.
name: Karolina Kurkova

quote: I think that I shall never see a poem lovely as a tree.
name: Joyce Kilmer

quote: Nature is something outside our body, but the mind is within us.
name: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: Nature also forges man, now a gold man, now a silver man, now a fig man, now a bean man.
name: Paracelsus

quote: The sky is the source of light in nature - and governs everything.
name: John Constable

quote: Love is a chain of love as nature is a chain of life.
name: Truman Capote

quote: Sweet April showers do spring May flowers.
name: Thomas Tusser

quote: Nature is the art of God.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: And the heart that is soonest awake to the flowers is always the first to be touch'd by the thorns.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: Miracles do not, in fact, break the laws of nature.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Nature is never finished.
name: Robert Smithson

quote: The poetry of the earth is never dead.
name: John Keats

quote: Nature scarcely ever gives us the very best; for that we must have recourse to art.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: All nature wears one universal grin.
name: Henry Fielding

quote: It seems to be a law of nature, inflexible and inexorable, that those who will not risk cannot win.
name: John Paul Jones

quote: Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Man can never be a woman's equal in the spirit of selfless service with which nature has endowed her.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Nature never deceives us; it is we who deceive ourselves.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: You can't just let nature run wild.
name: Walt Disney

quote: I hold grudges, but I can't hate nobody; that's not my nature.
name: The Notorious B.I.G.

quote: If I had to choose a religion, the sun as the universal giver of life would be my god.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Miracles are not contrary to nature, but only contrary to what we know about nature.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: That which is not good for the bee-hive cannot be good for the bees.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: Nature is an infinite sphere of which the center is everywhere and the circumference nowhere.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Mother Nature is the great equalizer. You can't get away from it.
name: Christopher Heyerdahl

quote: At Baptism, I received grace - that quality that makes me share in the very nature of God.
name: Mother Angelica

quote: I have lived long enough to satisfy both nature and glory.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Sunsets are so beautiful that they almost seem as if we were looking through the gates of Heaven.
name: John Lubbock

quote: All men are by nature born equally free and independent.
name: George Mason

quote: I perhaps owe having become a painter to flowers.
name: Claude Monet

quote: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: The roots of racism lie deep in man's nature, wounded and bruised by original sin.
name: Sargent Shriver

quote: Man is but a reed, the most feeble thing in nature, but he is a thinking reed.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was.
name: Toni Morrison

quote: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
name: Epictetus

quote: A dog is a vehicle, you know; a dog is a window to Mother Nature, and that's the closest species we have.
name: Cesar Millan

quote: A desire to resist oppression is implanted in the nature of man.
name: Tacitus

quote: By nature, men love newfangledness.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: What we observe is not nature itself, but nature exposed to our method of questioning.
name: Werner Heisenberg

quote: Land really is the best art.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Mere goodness can achieve little against the power of nature.
name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: What would be left of our tragedies if an insect were to present us his?
name: Emil Cioran

quote: Nature is infinitely creative. It is always producing the possibility of new beginnings.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
name: Jules Renard

quote: My boy, one small breeze doesn't make a wind storm.
name: John McGraw

quote: Love is a strange master, and human nature is still stranger.
name: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quote: Let the gentle bush dig its root deep and spread upward to split one boulder.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Bats drink on the wing, like swallows, by sipping the surface, as they play over pools and streams.
name: Gilbert White

quote: Ocean: A body of water occupying about two-thirds of a world made for man - who has no gills.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: We must always take from nature what we paint and always choose the most beautiful things.
name: Leon Battista Alberti

quote: But more wonderful than the lore of old men and the lore of books is the secret lore of ocean.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: The man who interprets Nature is always held in great honor.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Nature knows no pause in progress and development, and attaches her curse on all inaction.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Being alone on the moors is scary; as the rain clouds settle in, it makes you realise your place in nature.
name: Dave Davies

quote: Perhaps nature is our best assurance of immortality.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Fishes live in the sea, as men do a-land; the great ones eat up the little ones.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Adapt or perish, now as ever, is nature's inexorable imperative.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty.
name: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: To me a lush carpet of pine needles or spongy grass is more welcome than the most luxurious Persian rug.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Let a hundred flowers bloom, let a hundred schools of thought contend.
name: Mao Zedong

quote: There is not a sprig of grass that shoots uninteresting to me.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: If one way be better than another, that you may be sure is nature's way.
name: Aristotle

quote: Only the brave know how to forgive... a coward never forgave; it is not in his nature.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: The true nature of evil is that it is so very casual.
name: James St. James

quote: The garden suggests there might be a place where we can meet nature halfway.
name: Michael Pollan

quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it.
name: Alice Walker

quote: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Failure is nature's plan to prepare you for great responsibilities.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: For greed all nature is too little.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: It is the nature of truth in general, as of some ores in particular, to be richest when most superficial.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: He that will enjoy the brightness of sunshine, must quit the coolness of the shade.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: To know what that true self is without social pressure is to know your true nature.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Anything created by human beings is already in the great book of nature.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: Nature provides exceptions to every rule.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.
name: Dave Barry

quote: The sky is the part of creation in which nature has done for the sake of pleasing man.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The scientific observer of Nature is a kind of mystic seeker in the act of prayer.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Art is a harmony parallel with nature.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: The psychical, whatever its nature may be, is itself unconscious.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Those things that nature denied to human sight, she revealed to the eyes of the soul.
name: Ovid

quote: Oh, the summer night, Has a smile of light, And she sits on a sapphire throne.
name: Bryan Procter

quote: I can't go against my nature because I am what I am. I don't try to be anyone different to who I am.
name: Brian McDermott

quote: One of the things I enjoy is the challenge of Mother Nature.
name: Nik Wallenda

quote: It's not just human nature to associate in tribes. It's deeper than that.
name: Jordan Peterson

quote: Man has lost the capacity to foresee and to forestall. He will end by destroying the earth.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Vegetation is the basic instrument the creator uses to set all of nature in motion.
name: Antoine Lavoisier

quote: Nature, like man, sometimes weeps from gladness.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Human judges can show mercy. But against the laws of nature, there is no appeal.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Things derive their being and nature by mutual dependence and are nothing in themselves.
name: Nagarjuna

quote: Behold the child, by Nature's kindly law pleased with a rattle, tickled with a straw.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: 'Healing,' Papa would tell me, 'is not a science, but the intuitive art of wooing nature.'
name: W. H. Auden

quote: Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: Trees love to toss and sway; they make such happy noises.
name: Emily Carr

quote: We'll be back to our nature documentary, 'Baggy the Anorexic Elephant' in just a second.
name: Colin Mochrie

quote: Human nature is above all things lazy.
name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Nature is a petrified magic city.
name: Novalis

quote: During all these years there existed within me a tendency to follow Nature in her walks.
name: John James Audubon

quote: In nature there are neither rewards nor punishments; there are consequences.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Nothing makes me so happy as to observe nature and to paint what I see.
name: Henri Rousseau

quote: I drank the silence of God from a spring in the woods.
name: Georg Trakl

quote: I have seen the movement of the sinews of the sky, And the blood coursing in the veins of the moon.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Read nature; nature is a friend to truth.
name: Edward Young

quote: Nature and books belong to the eyes that see them.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When you go in search of honey you must expect to be stung by bees.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: Energy, like the biblical grain of the mustard-seed, will remove mountains.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
name: Voltaire

quote: We are by nature observers, and thereby learners. That is our permanent state.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Race hate isn't human nature; race hate is the abandonment of human nature.
name: Orson Welles

quote: When nature has work to be done, she creates a genius to do it.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Unless a tree has borne blossoms in spring, you will vainly look for fruit on it in autumn.
name: Walter Scott

quote: To the artist there is never anything ugly in nature.
name: Auguste Rodin

quote: It may be a mistake, that man, in a state of nature, is more disposed to cruelty than courtesy.
name: Mercy Otis Warren

quote: I am following Nature without being able to grasp her, I perhaps owe having become a painter to flowers.
name: Claude Monet

quote: Politeness is to human nature what warmth is to wax.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: How beautiful the leaves grow old. How full of light and color are their last days.
name: John Burroughs

quote: How strange that nature does not knock, and yet does not intrude!
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Suffering is permanent, obscure and dark, And shares the nature of infinity.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Art is the right hand of Nature. The latter has only given us being, the former has made us men.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Chaos was the law of nature; Order was the dream of man.
name: Henry Adams

quote: Nature is not human hearted.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Words, like nature, half reveal and half conceal the soul within.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Now that I'm older, I have a much better appreciation of nature, and I love being alone.
name: Gia Coppola

quote: Death, like birth, is a secret of Nature.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: All art is but imitation of nature.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: It is human nature to think wisely and act in an absurd fashion.
name: Anatole France

quote: Study hard so that you can master technology, which allows us to master nature.
name: Che Guevara

quote: Human nature is not nearly as bad as it has been thought to be.
name: Abraham Maslow

quote: The missing link in cosmology is the nature of dark matter and dark energy.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: We have much to learn by studying nature and taking the time to tease out its secrets.
name: David Suzuki

quote: The very nature of science is discoveries, and the best of those discoveries are the ones you don't expect.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Nature uses human imagination to lift her work of creation to even higher levels.
name: Luigi Pirandello

quote: Subdue your appetites, my dears, and you've conquered human nature.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: The earth has received the embrace of the sun and we shall see the results of that love.
name: Sitting Bull

quote: One could not pluck a flower without troubling a star.
name: Loren Eiseley

quote: We must use the wrath of nature as our teacher.
name: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: The very winds whispered in soothing accents, and maternal Nature bade me weep no more.
name: Mary Shelley

quote: Like music and art, love of nature is a common language that can transcend political or social boundaries.
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: My father considered a walk among the mountains as the equivalent of churchgoing.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: It is often my nature to be abstract, hidden in plain sight, or nowhere at all.
name: Gerard Way

quote: We cannot command Nature except by obeying her.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Consistency is contrary to nature, contrary to life. The only completely consistent people are dead.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: My inspiration comes from the common man and nature.
name: Kailash Kher

quote: I consider nature a vast chemical laboratory in which all kinds of composition and decompositions are formed.
name: Antoine Lavoisier

quote: The love story for me was the nature of the love and not the age of the lovers.
name: Kate Capshaw

quote: A hen is only an egg's way of making another egg.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Hope is nature's veil for hiding truth's nakedness.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: I love not man the less, but Nature more.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Controversy is part of the nature of art and creativity.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: The subtlety of nature is greater many times over than the subtlety of the senses and understanding.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: When I have a terrible need of - shall I say the word - religion. Then I go out and paint the stars.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Nature is the master of talents; genius is the master of nature.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: I was a spooky kid; that was just my nature.
name: Elizabeth Marvel

quote: Self-preservation is the first law of nature.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: The least movement is of importance to all nature. The entire ocean is affected by a pebble.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Light is the greatest disinfectant in nature and also in organizations.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: As the twig is bent the tree inclines.
name: Virgil

quote: Flowers are without hope. Because hope is tomorrow and flowers have no tomorrow.
name: Antonio Porchia

quote: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: I like trees because they seem more resigned to the way they have to live than other things do.
name: Willa Cather

quote: Human nature is not of itself vicious.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: You can never really go wrong if you take nature as an example.
name: Christian Dior

quote: The air soft as that of Seville in April, and so fragrant that it was delicious to breathe it.
name: Christopher Columbus

quote: Tis distance lends enchantment to the view, and robes the mountain in its azure hue.
name: Thomas Campbell

quote: Communism is in conflict with human nature.
name: Ernest Renan

quote: All are but parts of one stupendous whole, Whose body Nature is, and God the soul.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable.
name: Liam Neeson

quote: I think that in today's world, by nature, we are all self-centered. And that often leads to selfishness.
name: Gary Chapman

quote: Whenever I get fed up with life I love to go wandering in nature.
name: Andrea Arnold

quote: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.
name: Richard P. Feynman

quote: Philosophy would render us entirely Pyrrhonian, were not nature too strong for it.
name: David Hume

quote: We may brave human laws, but we cannot resist natural ones.
name: Jules Verne

quote: Fracking kills, and it doesn't just kill us. It kills the land, nature and, eventually, the whole world.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: Nature abhors annihilation.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Whatsoever is contrary to nature is contrary to reason, and whatsoever is contrary to reason is absurd.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: By nature and doctrines I am addicted to the habit of discovering choice places wherein to feed.
name: O. Henry

quote: Earth is a flower and it's pollinating.
name: Neil Young

quote: Nature, to be commanded, must be obeyed.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Thus happiness depends, as nature shows, less on exterior things than most suppose.
name: William Cowper

quote: The counterfeit and counterpart of Nature is reproduced in art.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: The old cathedrals are good, but the great blue dome that hangs over everything is better.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Human nature is such that monogamy is a really hard thing to achieve.
name: Sienna Miller

quote: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Nature is wont to hide herself.
name: Heraclitus

quote: The sun, too, shines into cesspools and is not polluted.
name: Diogenes

quote: Disasters are called natural, as if nature were the executioner and not the victim.
name: Eduardo Galeano

quote: Knowledge has value only insofar as it contributes to the all-round development of the whole nature of man.
name: Rudolf Steiner

quote: Nature can do more than physicians.
name: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Original thought, original artistic expression is by its very nature questioning, irreverent, iconoclastic.
name: Salman Rushdie

quote: We must return to nature and nature's god.
name: Luther Burbank

quote: That's the nature of basketball. You gotta go out there and compete.
name: Trae Young

quote: I'm not really part of any group or clique or gang because that's always been my nature.
name: Jack Dee

quote: Let us permit nature to have her way. She understands her business better than we do.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Our ideas must be as broad as Nature if they are to interpret Nature.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Science is about unravelling nature.
name: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: There is the sky, which is all men's together.
name: Euripides

quote: Nature has never read the Declaration of Independence. It continues to make us unequal.
name: Will Durant

quote: With the coming of spring, I am calm again.
name: Gustav Mahler

quote: Nature has left this tincture in the blood, That all men would be tyrants if they could.
name: Daniel Defoe

quote: If you violate Nature's laws you are your own prosecuting attorney, judge, jury, and hangman.
name: Luther Burbank

quote: To eat steak rare... represents both a nature and a morality.
name: Roland Barthes

quote: It is human nature to stand in the middle of a thing.
name: Marianne Moore

quote: The world is always in movement.
name: V. S. Naipaul

quote: Love of man for woman - love of woman for man. That's the nature, the meaning, the best of life itself.
name: Zane Grey

quote: There is no forgiveness in nature.
name: Ugo Betti

quote: Nature and nature's laws lay hid in the night. God said, Let Newton be! and all was light!
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Man's heart away from nature becomes hard.
name: Standing Bear

quote: Nature's music is never over; her silences are pauses, not conclusions.
name: Mary Webb

quote: Nature is a book, a letter, a fairy tale (in the philosophical sense) or whatever you want to call it.
name: Johann Georg Hamann

quote: To cherish what remains of the Earth and to foster its renewal is our only legitimate hope of survival.
name: Wendell Berry

quote: Destruction, hence, like creation, is one of Nature's mandates.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: It's the Power of the Almighty, the Splendor of Nature, and then you.
name: Al Franken

quote: I am extremely square and obedient in nature!
name: Tina Fey

quote: The groves were God's first temples.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: War is so complex; human nature is so complex. There's no filmmaker who has ever figured it out perfectly.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: Spring won't let me stay in this house any longer! I must get out and breathe the air deeply again.
name: Gustav Mahler

quote: I am two with nature.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Everything lives and lasts by the inner necessity of its being, by its own nature's need.
name: Richard Wagner

quote: Science is the ultimate tool to reveal the laws of nature, and the one word written on its banner is Truth.
name: Dan Shechtman

quote: Nature moves towards balance.
name: Joel Salatin

quote: Even though I am an actor, by nature I am what you could call a homely girl.
name: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: I believe that laughter is the best emotional Band-Aid in the world. It's like nature's Neosporin.
name: Matt LeBlanc

quote: You can change the circumstances but you can never change man's inner nature.
name: Ron Perlman

quote: Eagles commonly fly alone. They are crows, daws, and starlings that flock together.
name: John Webster

quote: Compassion is a call, a demand of nature, to relieve the unhappy as hunger is a natural call for food.
name: Joseph Butler

quote: The sun, the earth, love, friends, our very breath are parts of the banquet.
name: Rebecca Harding Davis

quote: Our linear concept of time means nothing to nature.
name: Robert Lanza

quote: Spring beckons! All things to the call respond; the trees are leaving and cashiers abscond.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush.
name: Doug Larson

quote: The little windflower, whose just opened eye is blue as the spring heaven it gazes at.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: Who would dare assign to art the sterile function of imitating nature?
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Death is the ugly fact which Nature has to hide, and she hides it well.
name: Alexander Smith

quote: Part of our human nature is finding new ways of being.
name: Bozoma Saint John

quote: All the universe is full of the lives of perfect creatures.
name: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

quote: What nature delivers to us is never stale. Because what nature creates has eternity in it.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Ah, summer, what power you have to make us suffer and like it.
name: Russell Baker

quote: Nature is inside art as its content, not outside as its model.
name: Marilyn French

quote: Nature was my kindergarten.
name: William Christopher Handy

quote: We do not see nature with our eyes, but with our understandings and our hearts.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Nature is neutral.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: It is only in the country that we can get to know a person or a book.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: We are all several different people. There are different aspects of our nature that are competing.
name: Harold Ramis

quote: We are embedded in a biological world and related to the organisms around us.
name: Walter Gilbert

quote: In nature there are few sharp lines.
name: A. R. Ammons

quote: The stars that have most glory have no rest.
name: Samuel Daniel

quote: Swans sing before they die - 'twere no bad thing should certain persons die before they sing.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Poor, dear, silly Spring, preparing her annual surprise!
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: Where hast thou wandered, gentle gale, to find the perfumes thou dost bring?
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: Nature is a good name for an effect whose cause is God.
name: William Cowper

quote: Pity the meek, for they shall inherit the earth.
name: Don Marquis

quote: The day, water, sun, moon, night - I do not have to purchase these things with money.
name: Plautus

quote: Night comes to the desert all at once, as if someone turned off the light.
name: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: He who does not become familiar with nature through love will never know her.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: All things are artificial, for nature is the art of God.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: It was one of those perfect English autumnal days which occur more frequently in memory than in life.
name: P. D. James

quote: Nothing is farther than earth from heaven; nothing is nearer than heaven to earth.
name: Augustus Hare

quote: To destroy is still the strongest instinct in nature.
name: Max Beerbohm

quote: Understanding the laws of nature does not mean that we are immune to their operations.
name: David Gerrold

quote: And Fall, with her yeller harvest moon and the hills growin' brown and golden under a sinkin' sun.
name: Roy Bean

quote: Sound is the vocabulary of nature.
name: Pierre Schaeffer

quote: Though pleas'd to see the dolphins play, I mind my compass and my way.
name: Matthew Green

quote: The earth is yet the place of the domicile of man and all the offspring of the first man.
name: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: There's no night without stars.
name: Andre Norton

quote: Custom, that is before all law; Nature, that is above all art.
name: Samuel Daniel

quote: I love the long grass coming up to meet the willows.
name: Jilly Cooper

quote: The fulness of the godhead dwelt in every blade of grass.
name: Elias Hicks

quote: A tree is an incomprehensible mystery.
name: Jim Woodring

quote: I've always regarded nature as the clothing of God.
name: Alan Hovhaness

quote: Maybe nature is fundamentally ugly, chaotic and complicated. But if it's like that, then I want out.
name: Steven Weinberg

quote: Nature's far too subtle to repeat herself.
name: Paul Muni
